game.title: Restoring the Ancient Relic
game.objective: Embark on a perilous journey to retrieve a long-lost relic and restore it.
game.description: Legends speak of the Ancient Relic, a powerful artifact hidden in the depths of the old forest. You have been recruited by the royal wizard, Archmage Azaron, to seek out this relic and restore its power.
game.reward: Arcane Amulet, granting increased magic resistance and mana regeneration.
game.quest-giver: Archmage Azaron, found at the Wizard's Tower located in the royal castle grounds.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the ancient forest, believed to be near the Elven Enclave.
task.description: Seek wisdom from the enigmatic Elven Oracle residing in the Elven Enclave. They may have knowledge about the forgotten path to the forest.
task.location: Elven Enclave, located north of the Silverwood River.

task.objective: Traverse the dangerous forest, battling ancient creatures and solving puzzles to discover the resting place of the relic.
task.description: Venture through treacherous terrains and face cunning riddles left behind by the long-forgotten guardians of the forest.
task.location: Ancient Forest, accessed via the portal in the ancient ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the Ancient Relic from its pedestal, overcoming any guardians or traps that protect it.
task.description: Approach the relic with caution, for it may contain residual enchantments or traps meant to safeguard its secrets.
task.location: Ritual Chamber, deep within the heart of the Ancient Forest.

task.objective: Return the relic to Archmage Azaron at the Wizard's Tower, allowing him to restore its magnificent power.
task.description: Convey the Ancient Relic safely to the Archmage, who possesses the arcane knowledge to unlock its true potential.
task.location: Wizard's Tower, located in the grounds of the royal castle.
